Name: testCustomResourceEvent()
Description: New instances of my CustomResourceDefinitions should result in my controller image to be executed against the resource

Name: testIgnoredWhenOwnedByResourceOfInterest()
Description: Resources should be ignored when they are owned by other resources of interest

Name: testCustomResourceEventWithNoControllerImage()
Description: The operator should automatically mark new instances of my CustomResourceDefinitions to 'successful' when I don't have a controller image for it (yet)

Name: shouldRemoveSuccessfullyCompletedPods()
Description: Should delete pods and wait until they have been successfully deleted

Name: testGenerationObservedIsSameAsCurrent()
Description: Resource modification events should be ignored when the 'generation' property on the metadata of the resource is the same as the 'observedGeneration' property on its status

Name: testCrdRegistration()
Description: All information related to my custom resource, the capabilities it supports and its controller images should be extracted from my CustomResourceDefinition's annotations

Name: shouldUpdateStatusOfOpaqueCustomResource()
Description: Should track phase updates on the status of opaque custom resources and in Kubernetes events

Name: testDuplicatesIgnored()
Description: Resource modification events should be ignored when Kubernetes it twice with the same resource version

Name: testIgnoreInstruction()
Description: Resource modification events should be ignored when the resource carries the annotation 'entando.org/processing-instruction=ignore'

Name: testGenerationObservedIsCurrentButForceInstructed()
Description: Resource modification events should be processed when using the annotation 'entando.org/processing-instruction=force' even when the 'generation' property on the metadata of the resource is the same as the 'observedGeneration' property on its status

Name: shouldRemovePodsAndWait()
Description: Should delete pods and wait until they have been successfully deleted

Name: shouldKillAllPreviousPods()
Description: Should always kill existing pods running against the same resource to avoid racing conditions

Name: testCapabilityEvent()
Description: Capabilities that my controller image supports should also result in my controller image to be executed against the ProvidedCapability

Name: shouldGarbageCollectSuccessulPods()
Description: Should automatically remove successful controller pods once the resource has progress to the 'successful' phase

Name: testCapabilityEventWithControllerImageOverride()
Description: Capabilities that my controller image supports should also result in the image specified in the entando-controller-image-overrides ConfigMap to be executed against the ProvidedCapability

Name: shouldCreateControllerPodPointingToResource()
Description: Should create a  controller pod that points to the newly created resource

Name: testProcessedByVersion()
Description: When a resource is processed successfully, the annotation 'entando.org/processed-by-version' should reflect the current version of the operator

Name: shouldCreateControllerPodPointingToResource()
Description: Should create a  controller pod that points to the newly created resource

Name: testExistingResourcesProcessed()
Description: Should run existing resources when starting up the ControllerCoordinator

Name: testGenerationObservedIsBehind()
Description: Resource modification events should be processed when the 'generation' property on the metadata of the resource is higher than the 'observedGeneration' property on its status

Name: testUpgrade()
Description: A resource should be processed again when the ControllerCoordinator starts up if it was processed with a version of the Operator that is now being replaced

Name: testCustomResourceEventWithControllerImageOverride()
Description: New instances of my CustomResourceDefinitions should result in the image specified in the entando-controller-image-overrides ConfigMap to be executed against the resource rather than the one on my CRD's annotation
